oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from William D. Vencil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Informs recipient (likely the father) of the death of William H. Merryman (Merriman) who died on March 5, 1865. The letter discusses the poor conditions at Fort Rice in the Dakota Territory. He also writes that they are frequently fighting Indians. The men are from Company H, 1st U.S. Volulteer Infantry.
